synopsis.text: Yuzuhara Konomi and her childhood friend, Takaki Kono, embark on a new journey together as they begin their high school years. Alongside familiar faces like their mutual childhood friend, Tamaki Kosaka, they also encounter a host of new personalities. As they navigate the typical high school experiences of classes and studies, Takaki finds himself in a whirlwind of unique interactions with various girls. From the class representative, Komaki, to the affluent and combative Yuma, and even Yuuji's self-assured older sister, Tamaki, each girl brings a new, exciting, or challenging experience. Little do they know, their shared experiences will pave the way for unforgettable adventures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
